input_str:
DENVER -- Last week, legal recreational marijuana sales began in Colorado, making Colorado the first state in the United States and the first government in the world to legalize and regulate a recreational marijuana market for adults.

As thousands lined up to buy those bags of legal weed in Denver -- in what could be the beginning of the end of the U.S. prohibition on marijuana -- it seems fitting that just blocks away, the first federal conviction for selling marijuana took place 77 years ago.

In August 1937, Congress effectively criminalized
